chapters.title: Chapter 6: Doorways
chapters.info: Lord Gaebril, p. 137 (115)—New advisor to Queen Morgase of Andor. Mat overheard him giving orders to kill Elayne while in the garden outside Gaebril's room. Elayne believes her mother to be too strong to let herself be influenced by a man, but Gaebril seems to be doing so quite effectively.
